briefTitle: Pharmacokinetic Comparison Of All FK-506 Formulations
officialTitle: A Steady-state Pharmacokinetic Comparison Of All FK-506 Formulations

interventions.name: Prograf vs Envarsus XR vs Astagraf XL
Prograf vs Astagraf XL vs Envarsus XR

arms.label: Prograf vs Envarsus XR vs Astagraf XL
Prograf vs Astagraf XL vs Envarsus XR

summary:
The purpose of the study is to compare the pharmacokinetic parameters of three different formulations of tacrolimus.

Eligible patients will be treated with all three formulations in a pre-defined sequence.

primaryOutcome.measure: Evaluation of T(Max) for Envarsus XR, Astagraf XL and Prograf.
